content: this beginner friendly pattern combines simple color changes with some fun texture it works up quickly and makes a great baby shower gift size 15 needles 4 skeins of lion brand wetq in 2 colors i used 1 5 skeins of the blush and just over 1 skein of the fisherman feel free to sell any items you make with this pattern links back to my etsy shop www etsy com/shop/craftsbysarahliz or blog www craftsbysarahliz blogspot com are appreciated but not required you are not allowed to redistribute this pattern or photos or sell them as your own thank you
